title: Marvelous two-story Home with Exceptional Character
posting_body: This home is available for Host to Own!
Move into your dream home, build a down payment by hosting guests in a private suite, and buy the home within three years.
Beautiful two-story home with exceptional curb appeal, full of builder upgrades and modern finishes.
Perched on a corner lot with a large private back yard and rare extended front and back porches, this is one of the premier homes in the neighborhood.
Open concept living room and kitchen with oversized back deck; perfect for entertaining, grilling, and enjoying Denver’s beautiful weather.
The kitchen has upgraded cabinets and countertops.
A western facing primary suite and beautiful primary bathroom complete the upper level.
The lower level makes room for an additional bedroom, full bathroom, laundry room and den/flex space with walkout access to the backyard.
All bathrooms are pristine with stylish modern palates.
Built in 2017, this home is easy to maintain, live in, and perfectly located with easy access to shopping, highways and golf courses.
Washer and dryer included, this home is move-in ready!
